benchmark_details.name: PL-MTEB (Polish Massive Text Embedding Benchmark)
benchmark_details.overview: PL-MTEB is a comprehensive benchmark for text embeddings in Polish consisting of 28 diverse NLP tasks from 5 task types, adapted based on previously used datasets by the Polish NLP community.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To standardize the evaluation of text embedding models for the Polish language.

data.source: PLSC (Polish Library of Science Corpus) consisting of titles and abstracts of scientific publications in Polish.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on task-specific evaluations and aggregations.
methodology.interpretation: Performance is evaluated based on the chosen metrics, with higher scores indicating better performance on respective tasks.
